channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ja Rule Says He's 'Very Happy and Excited' to Become a Grandfather, Adds It's a 'Blessing' (Exclusive)
item.description: The rapper announced the exciting news in October that his daughter, Brittney, is pregnant and expecting her first baby

item.title: Pat Montandon, TV Host and Socialite Who Dated Frank Sinatra, Dies at 96

item.title: Elsie Hewitt Shows Off Post-Baby Body 2 Weeks After Welcoming Daughter with Pete Davidson

item.title: “Verity ”Director Reacts to Those Leaked Dakota Johnson Set Photos, Plus Fans' 'Wild' Reaction (Exclusive)
item.description: Michael Showalter shared his two cents on the leaked snapshots with PEOPLE at the premiere of his film 'Oh. What. Fun.'
